weapons.refinement: Untuk setiap karakter dalam party yang berasal dari Liyue, karakter yang menggunakan senjata ini mendapatkan peningkatan {{0}}% ATK dan {{1}}% CRIT Rate. Efek ini dapat ditumpuk maks. 4 lapis.

weapons.name: Prototype Archaic
weapons.description: Sebuah greatsword kuno yang ditemukan di Blackcliff Forge. Mempunyai kekuatan ayunan yang luar biasa seolah dapat membelah dimensi.
weapons.refinement: Saat mengenai musuh, Normal atau Charged Attack memiliki 50% persentase untuk mengakibatkan DMG tambahan sebesar {{0}}% ATK di area kecil. Dapat terpicu setiap 15 detik

weapons.name: Rainslasher
weapons.description: Pedang besar tanpa mata pedang yang bersinar gelap. Meremukkan musuh-musuhnya dengan kekuatan yang besar.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan {{0}}% DMG terhadap musuh yang terpengaruh Hydro atau Electro.

weapons.name: Royal Greatsword
weapons.description: Pedang panjang tua milik bangsawan Mondstadt di masa lampau. Terbuat dari bahan dengan kualitas terbaik, dan telah melalui ujian waktu. Pedang yang digunakan oleh keluarga kerajaan.
weapons.refinement: Saat mengakibatkan DMG pada musuh, meningkatkan {{0}}% CRIT Rate. Maksimum 5 lapis, dan saat serangan CRIT terpicu, seluruh lapisan CRIT Rate hilang.

weapons.name: Serpent Spine
weapons.description: Senjata kuno langka yang berasal dari laut, suaranya bagaikan suara ombak di masa lampau.
weapons.refinement: Saat karakter bertarung, setiap 4 detik meningkatkan {{0}}% DMG yang diakibatkan dan {{1}}% DMG yang diterima. Efek ini dapat ditumpuk maksimum 5 lapis, dan akan berkurang 1 lapis saat menerima DMG. Efek tidak akan hilang saat karakter bertarung digantikan.

weapons.name: The Bell
weapons.description: Greatsword yang besar dengan sebuah jam tertanam di tengahnya, tetapi mesin di dalamnya telah rusak sejak lama.
weapons.refinement: Saat menerima DMG, menciptakan sebuah perisai yang dapat menahan DMG sebesar {{0}}% dari Max HP. Perisai ini bertahan selama 10 detik, atau sampai terhancurkan. Perisai dapat terpicu setiap 45 detik. Saat terlindungi oleh perisai, karakter memperoleh peningkatan {{1}}% DMG.

weapons.name: Whiteblind
weapons.description: Pedang indah yang memiliki bagian tumpul di mata pedangnya. Mencapai Liyue setelah melewati tangan beberapa pedagang. Dapat menjadi senjata mematikan di tangan orang yang dapat menggunakannya.
weapons.refinement: Saat mengenai musuh, Normal atau Charged Attack meningkatkan {{0}}% ATK dan DEF selama 6 detik. Maksimum 4 lapis. Dapat terpicu setiap 0,5 detik.

weapons.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
weapons.description: Pedang dekorasi yang telah membatu oleh waktu, tetapi perhiasan di dalamnya masih dapat terlihat jelas. Memberikan kekuatan melawan angin waktu bagi penggunanya.
weapons.refinement: Setelah Elemental Skill mengakibatkan DMG, terdapat {{0}}% persentase CD Skill langsung selesai. Dapat terpicu setiap {{1}} detik.

weapons.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
weapons.description: Pedang besar kuno yang tersimpan di antara mural. Ditempa dari Starsilver, mempunyai kekuatan untuk membelah es dan salju.
weapons.refinement: Saat Normal atau Charged Attack mengenai musuh, memiliki {{0}}% persentase untuk menciptakan Everfrost Icicle di atas musuh, mengakibatkan DMG area sebesar {{1}}% ATK. Jika musuh berada dalam efek Cryo, maka Everfrost Icicle akan mengakibatkan DMG sebesar {{2}}% ATK. Efek ini dapat terpicu setiap 10 detik.

weapons.name: Skyward Pride
weapons.description: Claymore yang melambangkan keagungan Dvalin yang mengumandang di bentang angkasa. Saat diayunkan, terdengar kekuatan Dvalin dan Anemo dalam suara yang ditimbulkannya.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan {{0}}% DMG. Setelah menggunakan Elemental Burst: Normal atau Charged Attack yang mengenai musuh akan menciptakan tebasan vakum yang mengakibatkan DMG sebesar {{1}}% ATK kepada musuh di jalurnya. Bertahan selama 20 detik, atau 8 tebasan vakum.

weapons.name: Wolf’s Gravestone
weapons.description: Pedang panjang yang digunakan oleh Wolf Knight. Dibentuk menggunakan selempeng besi yang biasa saja oleh seorang blacksmith kota. Tetapi persahabatannya dengan para serigala memberikan kekuatan yang spesial di dalam karya ini.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan {{0}}% ATK. Saat berhasil mengenai musuh dengan HP kurang dari 30%, meningkatkan {{1}}% ATK seluruh anggota party selama 12 detik. Dapat terpicu setiap 30 detik.

weapons.name: The Unforged
weapons.description: Pedang tanpa ujung yang memiliki kekuatan hebat untuk mengusir iblis.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan kekuatan perisai sebesar {{0}}%. Serangan yang mengenai musuh meningkatkan ATK sebesar {{1}}% selama 8 detik. Maksimal 5 lapis. Dapat terpicu setiap 0,3 detik. Saat dilindungi oleh perisai, efek ATK ini meningkat sebesar 100%.

weapons.name: Beginner’s Protector
weapons.description: Sebuah polearm yang sangat lurus seperti sebuah tiang bendera. Cocok digunakan di berbagai situasi.

weapons.name: Iron Point
weapons.description: Mata pedangnya sangat tajam, sebuah senjata dengan keseimbangan yang baik, senjata ini populer di kalangan para petualang.

weapons.name: Black Tassel
weapons.description: Warnanya yang hitam memberikan solusi pada White Tassel yang mudah kotor.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan {{0}}% DMG terhadap Slime.

weapons.name: Halberd
weapons.description: Sebuah polearm dengan sebilah kapak terpasang di atasnya yang bisa menyebabkan DMG luar biasa. Senjata yang sangat disukai oleh prajurit Millelith.
weapons.refinement: Normal Attack mengakibatkan serangan tambahan sebesar {{0}}% ATK pada musuh. Hanya dapat terpicu setiap 10 detik.

weapons.name: White Tassel
weapons.description: Senjata standar milik prajurit Millelith dengan poros yang kokoh dan ujung tombak yang tajam. Sebuah senjata yang dapat diandalkan.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan DMG Normal Attack sebesar {{0}}%.

weapons.name: Blackcliff Pole
weapons.description: Senjata yang terbuat dari blackstone dan aerosiderite. Bercahaya merah tua pada bilah hitamnya.
weapons.refinement: Setelah mengalahkan musuh, meningkatkan {{0}}% ATK selama 30 detik. Maksimum 3 lapis, dan durasi setiap lapis tidak terpengaruh satu sama lain.

weapons.name: Crescent Pike
weapons.description: Senjata indah dengan mata pedang yang sangat panjang di bagian atas, dan sabit di bagian bawah. Mencapai di Liyue setelah melalui tangan beberapa tangan pedagang. Dengan latihan, ini bisa menjadi senjata mematikan.
weapons.refinement: Setelah mengambil Elemental Orb atau Particle, Normal dan Charged Attack mendapatkan {{0}}% DMG tambahan selama 5 detik.

weapons.name: Deathmatch
weapons.description: Tombak tajam berwarna merah darah yang sangat berharga bagi seorang gladiator di masa lalu. Ujungnya diwarnai dengan darah binatang buas dan manusia yang tak terhitung jumlahnya.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan {{0}}% ATK dan {{1}}% DEF ketika terdapat 2 musuh atau lebih di sekitar karakter; Jika jumlah musuh di sekitar karakter kurang dari 2, meningkatkan {{2}}% ATK.

weapons.name: Dragon’s Bane
weapons.description: Tombak dengan ukiran naga emas yang membelit menjadi satu. Ringan dan tajam, mungkin senjata ini sungguh dapat membunuh naga.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan {{0}}% DMG terhadap musuh yang terkena elemen Hydro atau Pyro.

weapons.name: Lithic Spear
weapons.description: Tombak panjang yang ditempa dari bebatuan di Guyun Stone Forest. Tingkat kekerasan tombak ini sungguh tiada duanya.
weapons.refinement: Untuk setiap karakter dalam party yang berasal dari Liyue, karakter yang menggunakan senjata ini mendapatkan peningkatan {{0}}% ATK dan {{1}}% CRIT Rate. Efek ini dapat ditumpuk maks. 4 lapis.

weapons.name: Prototype Starglitter
weapons.description: Sebuah glaive yang ditemukan di Blackcliff Forge. Kilatan cahaya di ujungnya yang tajam bagaikan bintang di malam hari.
weapons.refinement: Setelah melancarkan Elemental Skill, meningkatkan {{0}}% Normal dan Charged Attack selama 12 detik. Efek ini dapat ditumpuk maksimum 2 lapis.

weapons.name: Favonius Lance
weapons.description: Polearm yang dibuat berdasarkan gaya dari Knights of Favonius. Gagangnya lurus dan panjang, dan mata pedangnya ringan seperti angin.
weapons.refinement: Serangan CRIT memiliki {{0}}% persentase untuk memunculkan sejumlah kecil Elemental Particle yang bisa memulihkan energy karakter sebanyak 6 pt. Dapat terpicu setiap {{1}} detik.

weapons.name: Royal Spear
weapons.description: Tombak yang dulu dipuja-puja oleh bangsawan kuno yang pernah menjajah Mondstadt. Tombak ini sudah lama tidak digunakan, tetapi masih tajam tiada banding.
weapons.refinement: Saat mengakibatkan DMG pada musuh, meningkatkan {{0}}% CRIT Rate. Maksimum 5 lapis, dan saat serangan CRIT terpicu, seluruh lapisan CRIT Rate hilang.

weapons.name: Dragonspine Spear
weapons.description: Sebuah tombak yang dibuat dari gigi naga. Anehnya, tombak ini terasa hangat saat disentuh.
weapons.refinement: Saat Normal atau Charged Attack mengenai musuh, memiliki {{0}}% persentase untuk menciptakan Everfrost Icicle di atas musuh, mengakibatkan DMG area sebesar {{1}}% ATK. Jika musuh berada dalam efek Cryo, maka Everfrost Icicle akan mengakibatkan DMG sebesar {{2}}% ATK. Efek ini dapat terpicu setiap 10 detik.

weapons.name: Vortex Vanquisher
weapons.description: Tombak tajam yang seakan-akan bisa menusuk segalanya. Saat tombak ini diayunkan, ujung tombak seakan-akan membuat retakan di udara.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan kekuatan perisai sebesar {{0}}%. Serangan yang mengenai musuh meningkatkan ATK sebesar {{1}}% selama 8 detik. Maksimal 5 lapis. Dapat terpicu setiap 0,3 detik. Saat dilindungi oleh perisai, efek ATK ini meningkat sebesar 100%.

weapons.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
weapons.description: Sebuah polearm giok yang diciptakan oleh para Archon, memiliki kekuatan untuk membunuh monster laut legenda.
weapons.refinement: Saat mengenai musuh, meningkatkan {{0}}% ATK selama 6 detik. Maks. 7 lapis. Dapat terpicu setiap 0,3 detik. Saat tumpukan penuh, meningkatkan {{1}}% DMG.

weapons.name: Skyward Spine
weapons.description: Tombak polearm yang melambangkan kebulatan hati Dvalin. Bagian atas gagangnya menengadah ke langit, dan terbelah di hadapan kekuatan angin dan langit.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan {{0}}% CRIT Rate dan 12% Normal ATK SPD. Selain itu, saat mengenai musuh, Normal dan Charged Attack memiliki 50% persentase untuk memicu pisau hampa yang mengakibatkan DMG di area kecil sebesar {{1}}% ATK. Efek ini dapat terpicu setiap 2 detik.

weapons.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
weapons.description: Pedang upacara yang diukir dari giok murni. Suara ayunannya seperti suara desahan napas yang samar.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan {{0}}% Max HP, dan memberikan Bonus ATK sebesar {{1}}% dari Max HP pengguna.

weapons.name: Staff of Homa
weapons.description: Sebuah "tongkat kayu bakar" yang pernah digunakan dalam ritual kuno dan telah lama hilang.
weapons.refinement: Meningkatkan 20% Max HP, dan memberikan Bonus ATK sebesar {{0}}% dari Max HP pengguna. Saat HP pengguna kurang dari {{1}}%, maka pengguna akan mendapatkan Bonus ATK tambahan sebesar {{2}}% dari Max HP.

weapons.name: Windblume Ode
weapons.description: Sebuah busur yang dihiasi dengan bunga tanpa nama, bunga tersebut mengandung harapan dari orang-orang yang juga tidak pernah berkesempatan memiliki sebuah nama.
weapons.refinement: Saat menggunakan Elemental Skill, pengguna busur ini akan mendapatkan berkat dari harapan kuno Windblume, meningkatkan {{0}}% ATK selama 6 detik.

weapons.name: Elegy for the End
weapons.description: Sebuah busur seanggun alat musik penyair, panah yang ditembakkan menghasilkan suara merdu yang mampu menembus hati seseorang.
weapons.refinement: Bagian dari "Millennial Movement" yang mengembara di tengah angin. Meningkatkan {{0}} Elemental Mastery, dan saat Elemental Skill atau Elemental Burst dari pengguna senjata ini mengenai musuh, Karakter akan mendapatkan Sigil of Remembrance. Efek ini dapat terpicu setiap 0,2 detik dan bisa terpicu walaupun Karakter tersebut tidak berada di medan bertarung. Saat kamu mempunyai 4 Sigil of Remembrance, semuanya akan terkonsumsi dan seluruh anggota party di sekitar akan mendapatkan efek "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" selama 12 detik. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" meningkatkan {{1}} Elemental Mastery dan {{2}}% ATK. Ketika efek ini sudah terpicu, kamu tidak akan mendapatkan Sigil of Remembrance selama 20 detik. Dari beragam efek "Millennial Movement" yang ada, efek dengan jenis sama tidak bisa ditumpuk.

weapons.name: Song of Broken Pines
weapons.description: Pedang besar seringan angin yang meniup dedaunan dengan lembut, tapi juga bagaikan angin topan yang ganas dan tanpa ampun bagi mereka yang korup.
weapons.refinement: Bagian dari "Millennial Movement" yang mengembara di tengah angin. Meningkatkan {{0}}% ATK; Saat Normal atau Charged Attack mengenai musuh, Karakter akan mendapatkan satu Sigil of Whispers. Efek ini dapat terpicu setiap 0,3 detik. Saat kamu mempunyai 4 Sigil of Whispers, semuanya akan terkonsumsi dan seluruh anggota party di sekitar akan mendapatkan efek "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" selama 12 detik. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" akan meningkatkan {{1}}% Normal ATK SPD dan meningkatkan {{2}}% ATK. Ketika efek ini sudah terpicu, kamu tidak akan mendapatkan Sigil of Whispers lagi selama 20 detik. Dari beragam efek "Millennial Movement" yang ada, efek dengan jenis sama tidak bisa ditumpuk.

weapons.name: Freedom-Sworn
weapons.description: Pedang biru langit yang mengingatkan pada lagu lama, senjata tajam seperti sumpah kebebasan di bangsa milik Dewa Angin.
weapons.refinement: Bagian dari "Millennial Movement" yang mengembara di tengah angin. Meningkatkan DMG sebesar {{0}}%, dan saat Karakter yang menggunakan senjata ini memicu Reaksi Elemental, Karakter akan mendapatkan Sigil of Rebellion. Efek ini dapat terpicu setiap 0,5 detik dan bisa terpicu walaupun Karakter tersebut tidak berada di lapangan. Saat kamu mempunyai 2 Sigil of Rebellion, semuanya akan terkonsumsi dan semua anggota party di sekitar akan mendapatkan efek "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" selama 12 detik. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" meningkatkan {{1}}% DMG Normal, Charged dan Plunging Attack, serta meningkatkan {{2}}% ATK. Ketika efek ini sudah terpicu, kamu tidak akan mendapatkan Sigils of Rebellion lagi selama 20 detik. Dari sekian banyak efek "Millennial Movement", efek dengan jenis yang sama tidak bisa ditumpuk.

weapons.name: Mitternachts Waltz
weapons.description: Busur yang diwarnai dengan warna kelam bagaikan dosa dan malam hari pada imajinasi yang liar.
weapons.refinement: Saat Normal Attack mengenai musuh, meningkatkan {{0}}% DMG Elemental Skill selama 5 detik; Saat Elemental Skill mengenai musuh, meningkatkan {{1}}% DMG Normal Attack selama 5 detik.

weapons.name: Dodoco Tales
weapons.description:
Buku anak-anak yang penuh dengan cerita pendek anak-anak yang bisa membuat pembacanya tertawa.
Mereka yang sudah dewasa sekalipun akan terpukau dengan kepolosan, kesucian petualangan kecil yang tergambarkan di dalamnya.
weapons.refinement: Saat Normal Attack mengenai musuh, meningkatkan {{0}}% DMG Charged Attack selama 6 detik. Saat Charged Attack mengenai musuh, meningkatkan {{1}}% ATK selama 6 detik.

bonus.bonus: Max HP +1000.
Membuka setiap jenis peti memulihkan 30% HP dalam waktu 5 detik.
Efek pemulihan yang diterima meningkat 20%.
Menggunakan Elemental Burst memulihkan 20% HP.
Mengambil Mora memulihkan 300 HP.
Meningkatkan 30% CRIT Rate dari Charged Attack.
Elemental RES +20%.
Saat menerima DMG elemen tertentu, meningkatkan 30% Elemental RES terhadap elemen tersebut selama 10 detik. Dapat terpicu setiap 10 detik.
Meningkatkan 30% DMG terhadap musuh dengan HP lebih dari 50%.
Meningkatkan 30% Elemental RES diri sendiri untuk setiap jenis elemen karakter di dalam party.
Meningkatkan 15% DMG Normal Attack dan Charged Attack.
Setelah melancarkan Elemental Skill, meningkatkan 25% DMG Normal dan Charged Attack selama 8 detik.
Meningkatkan 20% DMG Elemental Skill.
Mengalahkan musuh memiliki 100% persentase CD Elemental Skill akan langsung selesai. Dapat terpicu setiap 15 detik.
Energy Recharge +20%.
Mendapatkan Elemental Particle/Orb akan memberikan 3 Energy kepada seluruh anggota party yang mengenakan bow atau catalyst. Dapat terpicu setiap 3 detik.
CRIT Rate +12%.
Saat HP kurang dari 70%, CRIT Rate meningkat 24%.
Elemental Mastery +80.
Setelah memicu Reaksi Elemental, akan meningkatkan 120 Elemental Mastery seluruh anggota party selama 8 detik.
Energy Recharge +20%.
Penggunaan Elemental Burst memulihkan 2 Energy seluruh anggota party (tidak termasuk diri sendiri) setiap 2 detik selama 6 detik. Efek ini tidak dapat ditumpuk.
Electro DMG Bonus +15%.
Meningkatkan 40% DMG yang diakibatkan Overloaded, Electro-Charged, dan Superconduct. Memicu efek-efek tersebut mengurangi 1 detik CD Elemental Skill. Dapat terpicu setiap 0,8 detik.
Electro RES +40%.
Meningkatkan 35% DMG terhadap musuh yang terpengaruh Electro.
Anemo DMG Bonus +15%.
Meningkatkan 60% Swirl DMG. Mengurangi 40% Elemental RES musuh sesuai elemen yang terkandung dalam swirl selama 10 detik.
Meningkatkan 15% efek pemulihan karakter.
Menggunakan Elemental Skill atau Elemental Burst meningkatkan 20% pemulihan yang diterima seluruh anggota party selama 10 detik.
Geo DMG Bonus +15%.

Saat memperoleh Elemental Shard yang terbentuk dari Reaksi Elemental Crystallize, seluruh anggota party memperoleh 35% peningkatan Elemental DMG terhadap elemen tersebut selama 10 detik. Hanya satu jenis Elemental DMG dapat diperoleh dengan cara ini.
Meningkatkan 35% kekuatan perisai.
Meningkatkan 40% Normal dan Charged Attack saat perisai aktif.
Pyro DMG Bonus +15%.
Meningkatkan 40% DMG Overloaded dan Burning. Meningkatkan 15% DMG Vaporize dan Melt. Setelah menggunakan Elemental Skill, meningkatkan 50% efek 2-Piece Set selama 10 detik. Maksimum 3 lapis.
Pyro RES +40%.
Meningkatkan 35% DMG terhadap musuh yang terpengaruh Pyro.
Meningkatkan 25% Physical DMG.
Dalam 10 detik setelah mengalahkan musuh, meningkatkan 50% DMG Charged Attack dan mengurangi konsumsi Stamina Charged Attack menjadi 0.
Meningkatkan 20% DMG Elemental Burst.
Setelah melancarkan Elemental Burst, meningkatkan ATK 20% semua anggota party selama 12 detik. Efek ini tidak dapat ditumpuk.
Meningkatkan 35% DMG Normal Attack karakter yang menggunakan Sword, Claymore, Polearm.
Elemental Mastery +80.
Meningkatkan 35% DMG Charged Attack karakter yang menggunakan Catalyst, Bow.
Mengurangi 40% durasi efek Pyro yang diterima.
Mengurangi 40% durasi efek Hydro yang diterima.
Mengurangi 40% durasi efek Electro yang diterima.
Mengurangi 40% durasi efek Cryo yang diterima.
Cryo DMG Bonus +15%.
Saat karakter memukul musuh yang terkena efek Cryo, CRIT Rate meningkat 20%. Jika musuh terkena Frozen, CRIT Rate meningkat lagi 20%.
Hydro DMG Bonus +15%.
Setelah melancarkan Elemental Skill, meningkatkan 30% DMG Normal dan Charged Attack selama 15 detik.
Cryo DMG Bonus +15%.
Meningkatkan 100% DMG yang diakibatkan Superconduct, meningkatkan 15% DMG yang diakibatkan Melt. Setelah melancarkan Elemental Burst, meningkatkan 30% Cryo DMG selama 10 detik.
Mengurangi 40% durasi efek Anemo yang diterima.

Saat Elemental Skill mengenai musuh, meningkatkan 20% ATK dan 30% kekuatan perisai seluruh anggota party di sekitar selama 3 detik. Efek ini hanya dapat terpicu setiap 0,5 detik. Efek tetap dapat terpicu meskipun Karakter yang mengenakan set Artefak ini tidak berada di medan pertempuran.
Meningkatkan 25% Physical DMG.

Saat Elemental Skill mengenai musuh, meningkatkan 9% ATK selama 7 detik. Efek ini dapat ditumpuk hingga 2 lapis dan dapat terpicu setiap 0,3 detik. Setelah menumpuk 2 lapis, efek dari Set 2 Bagian akan meningkat 100%.

materials.name: Teachings of Freedom
materials.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom to live is one of such. It is the freedom to live freely and healthily without concerns of one's own safety.

materials.name: Guide to Freedom
materials.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
The freedom of travel is one of such. It is the freedom to traverse the land freely without being obstructed.

materials.name: Philosophies of Freedom
materials.description:
Freedom is the spirit of the land of the wind.
To sing is one such freedom. To sing on the land created by the Anemo Archon is to send your heart away with the song on the wind.

materials.name: Teachings of Prosperity
materials.description:
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the blessing of Liyue, it is the foundation of the great city built by the gods and the people of Liyue, and it is the source of the peace and safety of the land.

materials.name: Guide to Prosperity
materials.description:
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is the promise made by Liyue to its children: To repay the hard-working laborers with enough gold to brighten up this land.

materials.name: Philosophies of Prosperity
materials.description:
Prosperity is the people's pursuit in the land of Geo.
Prosperity is Liyue's past, present, and future. This prosperity is unmatched and unobtainable by any other nations — it all belongs to Liyue and its inhabitants.

materials.name: Teachings of Dilligence
materials.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Diligence is having the bravery and the strength to conquer mountains and seas and to pursue gold and prosperity through honest, hard work.

materials.name: Guide to Dilligence
materials.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is the catalyst that flows in the blood of the people of Liyue, able to turn rocks into gold. It is what lies behind the greatness of its great commercial port.

materials.name: Philosophies of Dilligence
materials.description:
Industriousness is the foundation of the land of Geo.
Industriousness is believing in one's own ability to earn a place in the land of the gods through sweat, wisdom, and power.

materials.name: Teachings of Resistance
materials.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to prevent past conflicts from ever being forgotten, like sprouts breaking through the soil, like the eternal wind eroding through stone walls.

materials.name: Guide to Resistance
materials.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the city of Wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to grant the citizens of Mondstadt the freedom they now enjoy, like the Anemo Archon blowing away the snow, or like Vennessa rising up to fight.

materials.name: Philosophies of Resistance
materials.description:
Resistance is the backbone of the land of the wind.
The history of Mondstadt is one of resistances. People rose up to allow the future Mondstadt's poetry to freely be that of the wind and be spread across the land.

materials.name: Teachings of Ballad
materials.description:
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of beautiful feelings. On a beautiful day, the breezes carry with them poetry that touches the heart of people like the wind caressing the leaves.

materials.name: Guide to Ballad
materials.description:
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the will to encourage. In the dark days, the gales in the streets and alleyways whisper words of fury, like the battle drums, like the low rumbling before the storm.

materials.name: Philosophies of Ballad
materials.description:
Poetry is the soul of the land of the wind.
Poetry is the manifestations of the desire to spread the word. Though nothing is eternal, though nothing will be the same, the wind's poetry will still spread beyond the skies, the land, the seas to every corner of the world.

materials.name: Teachings of Gold
materials.description:
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the blood that flows deep within Liyue's veins, the muscle that makes up Liyue's beating heart, and the bones that make Liyue stand proud.

materials.name: Guide to Gold
materials.description:
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold symbolizes conversion. This is the unspoken understanding between Liyue's mountains, land, city, and people. In Liyue, industriousness is converted into gold, and gold into prosperity.

materials.name: Philosophies of Gold
materials.description:
Gold is the symbol of the land of Geo.
Gold is the wealth of Liyue, but Liyue's true wealth is the hearts of its people that shine like gold.

materials.name: Tail of Boreas
materials.description:
A handful of tail scales from the Great Wolf King of the North.
Even without his physical body and beyond death, Boreas still possesses extraordinary powers. He took a form comprised of ice and wind to embrace a new challenge, but even such a form could not house all of his power. The ice scales that fell during the battle still retain some of their spiritual energy.

materials.name: Ring of Boreas
materials.description:
A bit of crystallized ice from the Great Wolf King of the North.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. Though his power may have diminished, he could still freeze the land in an instant.

materials.name: Spirit Locket of Boreas
materials.description:
A bit of the Great Wolf King of the North's power drawn from its soul.
This land was once a realm of freezing-cold blizzards and ice storms filled with razor-sharp ice shards, all at the command of Boreas. In his final moments, he finally realized the chilling north wind could only extinguish life, not nurture it. Therefore, Boreas let his powers freely flow into the land to protect it and its inhabitants.

materials.name: Dvalin's Plume
materials.description:
A feather from the tail of the Dragon of the East.
As a dragon's feather it has experienced more than a thousand years' worth of winds. One senses within it a yearning for freedom so strong that it could whip up a light breeze to rescue it from its current confines. Its former owner's recognition of you is what makes it content to stay in your hands.

materials.name: Dvalin's Claw
materials.description:
A claw from the Dragon of the East.
It once contained the shadow dragon Durin's vile poison, having torn through the latter's flesh in battle. Thanks to your purification and healing, it is no longer toxic.

materials.name: Dvalin's Sigh
materials.description:
A bit of power taken from the whirlwinds evoked by the Dragon of the East.
Beautiful and transparent, both trade winds and tornadoes will work in his name. The winds move as his companion, his voice, and his freedom.His enemies are the thousands who stand against the wind.

materials.name: Tusk of Monoceros Caeli
materials.description:
The horn of a whale that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is said that the shape of one's constellation determines one's character. The image of a whale cruising across the celestial heights represents a solipsism that seeks to crush and devour all in its path.
Embracing this aspect of himself, Childe gleefully summoned one such beast before throwing himself into battle against you.

materials.name: Shard of a Foul Legacy
materials.description:
The shard of a weapon that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is stained with a profound color that is not of this world, no doubt due to the land of endless darkness that the young boy saw with his own two eyes.
Perhaps it has nothing to do with the power of a Delusion, but as they say, the weapon reflects its user...

materials.name: Shadow of the Warrior
materials.description:
A fragment of power that you obtained from defeating Childe, who had unleashed the might of his Delusion.
It is the product of a will to fight that has been honed over countless slaughters.
If humans do indeed have destinies, then his must surely have been twisted by such deeds. Why else, then, would he always be at the heart of every conflict?

materials.name: Tile of Decarabian’s Tower
materials.description: The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian’s City
materials.description: Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian’s Epic
materials.description: Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Scattered Piece of Decarabian’s Dream
materials.description: The people did not bow to Decarabian out of respect or adoration, but because the harsh winds had laid them low. This was the shattered dream and ambition of the Anemo Archon before the rise of Barbatos.He tried so hard to make his dream come true, and so the fragments of that dream are still mighty.

materials.name: Luminous Sands from Guyun
materials.description: The stone pillars that tower amid Guyun Stone Forest were once the stone spears Morax used to defeat his enemies. Over time, the gods' substance has seeped into the pillars that pin them down, lending them divine power. The pillars sometimes shed fragments of hatred and curses.

materials.name: Lustrous Stone from Guyun
materials.description: The learned know that Guyun Stone Forest is far more than simply a miraculous sight on the sea to behold: It is the cemetery of the former gods of Liyue. Hatred and filth have periodically risen up from it, but all have been subdued by a demon-conquering young man.

materials.name: Relic from Guyun
materials.description: The stone spear has a glimmering core formed by the power of the defeated gods. Their hatred is not directed at Morax, however, for they have lost themselves a long time ago and are incapable of holding personal grudges.

materials.name: Divine Body from Guyun
materials.description: That which lurks within and animates this relic are the divine remains of lamenting gods. They are unrealized ideals, designs for a prosperous humanity that could never be. They may now lie deep within stone and sea, but they will not go quietly into the night.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Lead Elixir
materials.description: Jueyun Karst is the realm of the mighty and illuminated adepti. But other than the ability to control the elements of the world, Jueyun Karst is also home to three other untold secrets: Alchemy, Sigils, and Sub-Space Creation.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Mercury Elixir
materials.description: With Fulu (Sigils), the adepti can store their power in the form of symbols, and with Waijing (Sub-Space Creation) they can fashion a cosmic paradise with the power of their minds. The manufacture of elixirs, however, has always been shrouded in mystery, for certain death follows for any who swallow them.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Gold Elixir
materials.description: Elixirs are in fact pills made from metal alloys. They were created by the adepti, and are able to grant weapons transcendent powers. However, they are rarely seen in the world due to the hubris of the practitioners of martial arts, who prized the ways of combat over the paths of the adepti.

materials.name: Mist Veiled Primo Elixir
materials.description: An elixir of the highest quality. It embodies a state of intertwining order and chaos, and is said to mirror how the world was when it was first created. Of course, a certain someone knows that this was not the case.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf’s Milk Tooth
materials.description:
Andrius' wolf pack is its blessed honor guard, and even the milk teeth of a wolf cub possess great potential.
In the past, the gods had the responsibility to love all people. Andrius was therefore quite unusual in that he became leader of the wolves, while only welcoming abandoned babies and wanderers when it came to humans.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf’s Cracked Tooth
materials.description:
The life of a wolf is not without violence, broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf’s Broken Fang
materials.description:
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

materials.name: Boreal Wolf's Nostalgia
materials.description: The Wolf King, believing himself to despise humans, thought himself unable to envision a happy life for humanity, making him unworthy of becoming the Lord of the Winds of the world. Therefore, he chose to disappear. Yet, in truth, he gazes on the ones abandoned by the world ever so gently.

materials.name: Grain of Aerosiderite
materials.description: A black meteor once fell beyond Liyue's Sea of Clouds, said to have fallen to vanquish a monster. However, it was stained by powerful tainted blood, so this item no longer possesses the pure power of Rex Lapis.

materials.name: Piece of Aerosiderite
materials.description: Rumors of sea monsters are commonplace in Liyue, since the other shore is an unknown region that lies outside of Teyvat. Without the protection of The Seven, all that lies beyond is unknown chaos. Only power beyond the order of Teyvat is able to stain the power of Rex Lapis black.

materials.name: Bit of Aerosiderite
materials.description: The coastal nations of Teyvat refer to the region beyond the protection of The Seven as the Dark Sea. It is said that many defeated gods refused to live under the new order of The Seven, so they fled to remote islands and became evil gods. However, their powers came from the same source as Rex Lapis, separate from this all-devouring darkness.

materials.name: Chunk of Aerosiderite
materials.description: When Khaenri'ah was destroyed, a great sinner created endless monsters with dark, alien blood flowing through their veins. They rampaged across the land, destroying all in their paths. They were mutated lifeforms, and the mutations were caused by powers from beyond this world. The black serpentine dragon Durin that attacked Mondstadt was one such mutated being.

materials.name: Fetters of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.description: It's a human thing to exaggerate a hero's story, even to the point of elevating the fetters that once bound the hero to the level of an enemy of true freedom.As a result, these fetters were granted extraordinary powers.

materials.name: Chains of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.description: The chains that once bound the great hero Vennessa. In truth, all gladiators would have worn chains in that era, and Vennessa was but one of many.

materials.name: Shackles of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.description: Vennessa was not truly bound by her chains. If she had so wished, no ordinary physical constraints forged in Mondstadt could have held her, for the land there yielded no ore of exceptional quality, nor did it possess the divine flame of her ancestral home.She was only bound by her responsibility to take care of her tribespeople.

materials.name: Dream of the Dandelion Gladiator
materials.description: Vennessa may have been freed from slavery, but she then found herself subject to many other, even greater forms of bondage. What began as a duty to her tribespeople extended to all of Mondstadt, then to the concept of freedom itself, and beyond a point even to the whole world.What she really hoped for, in truth, was that the world might grow stronger.

materials.name: Crown of Insight
materials.description:
A precious Talent Level-Up material.
Once a medium for the storage and transfer of wisdom in ancient times. Now, wisdom is found in ancient texts and in profound speech.
Nevertheless, this Crown of Insight must still be able to impart some transcendent power and wisdom to its bearer.

materials.name: Hunter's Sacrificial Knife
materials.description: A sharp alloy weapon. Though its owner has been lost, it still reflects a disturbingly cold light.

materials.name: Agent's Sacrificial Knife
materials.description: An oddly-shaped weapon made with superior Snezhnayan technology that once belonged to a senior agent. Proper training is required for using this strange weapon.

materials.name: Inspector's Sacrificial Knife
materials.description: In the hands of its lord, this fierce weapon has handled many "debts". No-one has eyes in the back of their heads, and this weapon and its related techniques are designed around that weakness.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.description: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.description: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Black Crystal Horn
materials.description: A metallic horn with an ominous shine decorated with black crystals of an unknown source. It has hardly been used at all. It is likely a ceremonial item of the hilichurls'.

materials.name: Chaos Device
materials.description: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. A part that once held the structure together. Its aesthetically-pleasing engineering is quite exquisite.

materials.name: Chaos Circuit
materials.description: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. Was once a logic circuit responsible for movement functions. Sadly, no-one is able to make sense of how it worked.

materials.name: Chaos Core
materials.description: Comes from ancient defunct relic structures. The core that once drove a mechanical beast. Should you come to understand its workings and reproduce it, you could perhaps change the world.

materials.name: Dead Ley Line Branch
materials.description: Fragile branches from deep within the earth. Even after years of aging, from beneath it's mottled surface you can see that its power is not yet entirely lost.

materials.name: Dead Ley Line Leaves
materials.description: A twig from deep within the earth. Though it is far from where it once lay, its leaves still pulsate with energy.

materials.name: Ley Line Sprout
materials.description: It is said that there was a great tree whose roots once spread out to every corner of the world, and this branch is said to be part of it. It is almost if it was never broken off and taken far away, for its vitality is such that it still sprouts new leaves even now.

materials.name: Mist Grass Pollen
materials.description: Strange spores created by Mist Grass in enclosed spaces. They are the Cicins' favorite food.

materials.name: Mist Grass
materials.description: Well-preserved Mist Grass. Some would take advantage of the Cicins' love for the Mist Grass to control them.

materials.name: Mist Grass Wick
materials.description: A rare bundle of Mist Grass that gives off a faint glow. Those who carry it invite both the Cicins and misfortune.

materials.name: Fragile Bone Shard
materials.description:
A bone shard once carried by a Geovishap.
Although they are quite fragile, they seem to still harbor some indescribable power.

materials.name: Sturdy Bone Shard
materials.description:
A fragment of an unknown creature's bones that appear to be prized by Geovishaps for some reason.
The fragment appears to be quite aged. Despite being dragon-like beasts with no spoken language, they still seem to have some sort of special affection for these bone shards.

materials.name: Fossilized Bone Shard
materials.description:
A fossilized bone fragment sometimes found after defeating Geovishaps.
Geovishaps all dream of growing into great dragons one day. They see these fossils as dragon bones and greatly cherish them, perhaps because they too hope to attain the dragons' longevity and power.

materials.name: Damaged Mask
materials.description:
A broken bone mask that once belonged to some hilichurl.
Now more broken than complete, it can no longer perform its primary function.

materials.name: Stained Mask
materials.description:
A bone mask, covered in unidentifiable stains, that emanates a mysterious odor.
Yet such is the devotion of hilichurls to masks that they will wear it nonetheless.

materials.name: Ominous Mask
materials.description:
A glossy bone mask with oil markings painted on it, meant to intimidate enemies.
No-one really knows why hilichurls are so fascinated with masks. Some say that it's because they don't want to see their own reflections in the water.

materials.name: Gloomy Statuette
materials.description: A vague portrayal of some unknown person. Even though it has seen many days, it still has not been damaged in any way.

materials.name: Dark Statuette
materials.description: A carved idol representing an unknown person. Contaminated with a dark and unfathomable power, simply holding it makes you feel uneasy.

materials.name: Deathly Statuette
materials.description: A carving that emanates an evil energy, with no indication of what it's truly made of. Simply focusing on it evokes dark whispering inside your very soul.

materials.name: Divining Scroll
materials.description: A scroll that likely relates to some kind of magic. Exudes an inexplicable but ominous warmth.

materials.name: Sealed Scroll
materials.description: An old scroll lacking in detail and clarity. By following the images on it, some magical creatures can recreate a small part of its magic.

materials.name: Forbidden Curse Scroll
materials.description: A scroll inscribed with ancient images. It is said that few can decipher its meaning, and the few scholars that have all went mad.

materials.name: Whopperflower Nectar
materials.description:
Nectar extracted from the stamen of a Whopperflower that contains trace amounts of elemental energy.
The taste of the nectar has a hint of Sweet Flower in it.

materials.name: Shimmering Nectar
materials.description:
Nectar that is full of pure elemental energy.
Scholars generally concur that Whopperflowers are advanced life forms among the elemental plants, but there has yet to be a satisfactory explanation regarding their predatory habits.

materials.name: Energy Nectar
materials.description:
A thick and sticky honey that is full of energy.
The Whopperflower hunts by tricking its prey, a process it uses to possibly evolve into a more powerful and pure form.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.description: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.description: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Weathered Arrowhead
materials.description: An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

materials.name: Treasure Hoarder Insignia
materials.description: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Silver Raven Insignia
materials.description: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

materials.name: Golden Raven Insignia
materials.description: A raven insignia that symbolizes the pride and the guiding principle of the Treasure Hoarders. Whether it's hidden amidst the vastness of the land or in the depths of the seas, as long as there are treasures to be hunted down, the spirit of Treasure Hoarders, who will stop at nothing to acquire them, will never die.

materials.name: Recruit's Insignia
materials.description: An insignia to identify the recruits. Makes one wonder about what the ones joining the Fatui's war machine were thinking.

materials.name: Sergeant's Insignia
materials.description: An insignia with a different shape to distinguish the sergeants from new recruits. Perhaps there are complicated emotions behind it.

materials.name: Lieutenant's Insignia
materials.description: An armband to identify officers. The Fatui possess a colossal army, so there must be something extraordinary about the ones who achieved this rank within the group.

materials.name: Slime Condensate
materials.description: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

materials.name: Slime Secretions
materials.description: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

materials.name: Slime Concentrate
materials.description: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.

materials.name: Mora
materials.description: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Basalt Pillar
materials.description:
A pillar formed by the shell of a Geo Hypostasis, composed of high-density Geo energy.
It is a testament to Geo's status as the heaviest of the elements. Maybe the reason a Geo Hypostasis creates this pillar out of its shell and raises itself is just to get closer to the sky, not to combat enemies.

materials.name: Cleansing Heart
materials.description:
A palmful of eternal water left by an oceanid.
Though it has already diffused among the depths of the lake, its purity remains all the same. But why would a creature so pure and clean as an oceanid covet the appearance of a being that roams the land, and assume such a form with pure water? They need not breathe nor do they require sustenance...

materials.name: Everflame Seed
materials.description: A seed that fuels the unending flames of the Pyro Regisvine. It emits Pyro energy as if it will burn all that has ever sprouted from the ground.Endless desires flow among turbulent energy deep within the earth. What desire could steadily hold such fire to the plants and long so eagerly to bathe everything in unquenchable flames?

materials.name: Hoarfrost Core
materials.description:
The exposed core of a defeated Cryo Regisvine. Pure Cryo energy is contained within it.
Energy and thoughts that swell deep within the earth will eventually erupt on the surface. Even the deathly silent frost will attach to living things on the ground, turning even ordinary vegetation like vines into huge, vicious predators.

materials.name: Hurricane Seed
materials.description:
The imploded form of an Anemo Hypostasis upon its defeat.Contains the essence of Anemo energy.
It is said that the power to create hurricanes resides within its seemingly fragile body. This butterfly of pure Anemo energy must surely be waiting for the day when it can conjure up storms once again.

materials.name: Lightning Prism
materials.description:
An Electro Hypostasis channels nearby elemental energy to repair damaged elemental entities. Contains the essence of Electro energy.
An ordinary prism separates white light into its component colors; a Lightning Prism, however, channels flowing energy and weaves them into lightning. It will continue to do so even after the Electro Hypostasis has been defeated.

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
materials.description: "A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
materials.description: "A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...Burnt to cinders for a dream."

materials.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
materials.description:
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

materials.name: Brilliant Diamond Sliver
materials.description: "Welcome to this world."

materials.name: Brilliant Diamond Fragment
materials.description: "Welcome to this world."

materials.name: Brilliant Diamond Chunk
materials.description: "Welcome to this world."

materials.name: Brilliant Diamond Gemstone
materials.description: "Welcome to this world."

materials.name: Nagadus Emerald Fragment
materials.description: "In the end, life opened its closed fist..."

materials.name: Nagadus Emerald Chunk
materials.description: "In the end, life opened its closed fist..."

materials.name: Nagadus Emerald Gemstone
materials.description: "In the end, life opened its closed fist...granting freedom of life to all."

materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Fragment
materials.description: "The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood."

materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Chunk
materials.description:
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future."

materials.name: Prithiva Topaz Gemstone
materials.description:
"The currencies that flow through this land are my flesh and blood.
For thus did I become the guarantor of the people's hard work, wisdom, and future.This is the trust I have placed in them. Betray it, and you taint my blood."

materials.name: Shivada Jade Fragment
materials.description: "Sorry..."

materials.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
materials.description: "Sorry...""...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

materials.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
materials.description: "Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?"Then, burn away the old world for me."

materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
materials.description: "This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
materials.description: "This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.It should hold absolute control over this world."

materials.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
materials.description: "This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."It should hold absolute control over this world."It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
materials.description: "My ideals have no stains."

materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
materials.description: "My ideals have no stains.I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

materials.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
materials.description:
"My ideals have no stains.I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
materials.description: "Still, the winds change direction."

materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
materials.description: "Still, the winds change direction.Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."

materials.name: Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
materials.description: "Still, the winds change direction."Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

materials.name: Calla Lily
materials.description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked, the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.

materials.name: Cecilia
materials.description: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

materials.name: Cor Lapis
materials.description: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae.

materials.name: Dandelion Seed
materials.description: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

materials.name: Glaze Lily
materials.description: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

materials.name: Jueyun Chili
materials.description: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

materials.name: Noctilucous Jade
materials.description: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.

materials.name: Philanemo Mushroom
materials.description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.

materials.name: Qingxin
materials.description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.

materials.name: Silk Flower
materials.description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.

materials.name: Small Lamp Grass
materials.description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.

materials.name: Starconch
materials.description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.

materials.name: Valberry
materials.description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet refreshing taste. In the past, the watchers of the storms found solace in the sweetness of the fruit and the hope for the city's security.

materials.name: Violetgrass
materials.description: A small flower with strong vitality. It was said its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.

materials.name: Windwheel Aster
materials.description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are "the visible winds.

materials.name: Wolfhook
materials.description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.

materials.name: Enhancement Ore
materials.description:
Gives 400 EXP.
A refined ingot with endless possibilities that can be used to enhance weapons.

materials.name: Fine Enhancement Ore
materials.description:
Gives 2,000 EXP.
For reasons unknown, this special and refined ore can be absorbed by weapons to greatly increase their strengths.

materials.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
materials.description:
Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

materials.name: Wanderer's Advice
materials.description:
Gives 1000 EXP.
These experiences are still beneficial even if one does not live in Teyvat.

materials.name: Adventurer's Experience
materials.description:
Gives 5000 EXP.
These experiences are very beneficial for journeys into the unknown.

materials.name: Hero's Wit
materials.description:
Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

materials.name: Juvenile Jade
materials.description:
A crystalline substance taken from a Primo Geovishap. Within it is contained the potential to become a dragon.
These dull crystals are precipitated within the bodies of vishaps sleeping in the mountains. Liyue folklore holds that they will gather power over many years, after which this crystal will, at last, replace their original heart, and the vishap will become a true dragon — one that can shake the mountains and split the earth.

materials.name: Starsilver
materials.description: A rare and precious ore formed by the unique geographical conditions and Ley Lines of Dragonspine.

materials.name: Vitalized Dragontooth
materials.description: A Dragontooth infused with vitality. Just its luster and texture are enough to make one uneasy...

materials.name: Iron Chunk
materials.description: This iron chunk can be turned into a multitude of handy items in the hands of a skilled craftsman.

materials.name: White Iron Chunk
materials.description: Skilled hands can make this into something brilliant.

materials.name: Crystal Chunk
materials.description: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

materials.name: Northlander Bow Billet
materials.description: Can be used to forge 4-star bows. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

materials.name: Northlander Catalyst Billet
materials.description: Can be used to forge 4-star catalysts. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

materials.name: Northlander Claymore Billet
materials.description: Can be used to forge 4-star claymores. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

materials.name: Northlander Polearm Billet
materials.description: Can be used to forge 4-star polearms. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

materials.name: Northlander Sword Billet
materials.description: Can be used to forge 4-star swords. Philosophers believe marble has the potential to be sculpted into a beautiful statue. Likewise, these billets have the potential to become something greater.

materials.name: Dust of Azoth
materials.description:
A device that can transmute elemental Ascension Materials and change their Elemental Type.Its practical uses notwithstanding, alchemy is the study of the nature of matter and the rules that underpin its transformations, and ultimately it seeks to comprehend the working principles of the world and the flow of the ley lines
It is not known who would share alchemical achievements of this magnitude with the civilizations of the world and why. But although the power to fundamentally transmute elemental energy in its crystallized and inert form is a highly useful one, this device also conceals the grave danger of disrupting the elemental balance...

materials.name: Magical Crystal Chunk
materials.description:
These crystal chunks can be refined into Weapon EXP materials by using Original Resin.
Crystals from mines that were eroded by the energy of the Ley Lines cannot be processed by ordinary means.

materials.name: Original Resin
materials.description:
Used to vitalize Petrified Trees and Ley Line Blossoms, allowing access to the treasures they hold. Energy regenerates over time.
It is said that the roots of all the Irminsul trees and blossoms in the world are intertwined at the deepest, most hidden place in the earth, and that the pattern the root system makes defines the Ley Lines of the world.

materials.name: Primogem
materials.description: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

materials.name: Crystalline Bloom
materials.description:
An ice crystal of exceeding purity that is created in the frigid blooming of a Cryo Hypostasis.
These frosty crystals will continue to grow according to their own cold, rigid laws, till one day a flower of winter shall bloom and freeze everything. Perhaps it is stagnant time, that never-thawing bosom, that is the essence of this undying flower.

materials.name: Dream Solvent
materials.description:
An item capable of changing Character Level-Up Materials obtained from memories and trials into whatever form is needed.
People once believed that spirits and memories had some material form. If someone dreamed of heaven before waking up clutching a flower, then that blossom must have been made from such a fantasy. Dream Solvent dissolves that which is obtained from memory and transforms it into some other dream.
Indeed, blows traded with the strong are stepping stones towards becoming stronger yourself.

materials.name: Dragon Lord's Crown
materials.description:
Horns created from hardened jade crystallized over a thousand years are the natural crown of the dragon king.
Infused with spirit and carved from bedrock, it was born from the mountain's heart to show the strength of the earth to the land amidst monoliths, and its long golden horns are the mark of its ancient strife with an ancient lord.
For a time, this horn was shattered and lost its luster, but now it gleams cold and gold as it sits in your palm.

materials.name: Bloodjade Branch
materials.description:
Nurtured by the might of the dragon king, these bone branches glitter with strange, unique colors.
Hatred coursed through the natural streams and kissed the cold moonlight, and from them were these crystalline branches born and grown...
Even though they were severed in battle, these branches steeped in dragon blood rustle as if eternally ill-at-ease.

materials.name: Gilded Scale
materials.description:
Scaled armor that grows naturally over mystical stone, tough and silent, and filled with the strength of the dragon king.
Across the years as countless generations returned to the mulch of the earth, gold and obsidian embedded themselves into flesh and blood forged from bedrock before spreading and turning into scales.
Searing agony, wordless cries... perhaps they will all vanish when the grudges that spawned them, too, finally come to an end.

materials.name: Maguu Kishin
materials.description:
This core can power the inorganic Maguu Kenki and cause it to wield a blade like a living being.
Flesh decays, and with it decays all martial art and memory, no matter how masterful or lovely.
Perhaps only by converting one's four limbs and body into sturdy mechanical parts, and by at last sacrificing one's very own heart for a sophisticated mechanical one, can one transcend transient flesh and approach the everlasting...

materials.name: Sea Ganoderma
materials.description: A species that only grows in certain special regions of the ocean and islands. It looks like a fungus of some sort, but it is in fact the result of the secretion and proliferation of certain soft-bodied organisms.

reactions.name: Crystalize
reactions.effect: Creates a crystal that will provide a shield when picked up.

reactions.name: Superconduct
reactions.effect: Deals AoE Cryo DMG and reduces the target's Physical RES by 50%.

reactions.name: Swirl
reactions.effect: Deals extra elemental damage and spreads the effect.

resonance.name: Enduring Rock
resonance.effect: Increases shield strength by 15%. Aditionally, characters protected by a shield will have the following special characterists: DMG dealt increased by 15%, dealing DMG to enemeies will decrease their Geo RES by 20% for 15s.

resonance.name: Fervent Flames
resonance.effect: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time. Increases ATK by 25%.

resonance.name: Soothing Waters
resonance.effect: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time. Increases incoming healing by 30%.

resonance.name: Impetuous Winds
resonance.effect: Decreases Stamina Consumption by 15%. Increases Movement SPD by 10%. Shortens Skill CD by 5%.

resonance.name: High Voltage
resonance.effect: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time. Superconduct, Overloaded, and Electro-Charged have a 100% chance to generate an Electro Elemental Particle (CD: 5s).

resonance.name: Shattering Ice
resonance.effect: Affected by Electro for 40% less time. Increases CRIT Rate against enemies that are Frozen or affected by Cryo by 15%.

resonance.name: Protective Canopy
resonance.effect: All Elemental RES by 15%. Physical RES + 15%
